WRITING.TITLE: Keeping track of Newly added series
WRITING.TEXT:
I would like to bookmark every single serie on kissanime in different categories for a project, but since KissAnime is constantly adding new series, how do I keep track of those? Can I see all those that I have not bookmarked yet anywhere ? Or getting an notification/rss feed/e-mail when a new serie is added ?
Kindest regards for helping me in advance!
I sent you a private message with the details!
Everything of Tom Day 3 If anyone is new to ambient, I got quite the playlist if you want!

WRITING.TITLE: HTC 10 or Other ?
WRITING.TEXT:
Price: Around 700 Euro Carrier: Mobile Vikings Country: Belgium Size Preference: Not above 5'5 What will it be used for: Pokmon Go, Snapchat and Music (Through headphones or bluetooth speakers) so great audio quality please! Preferred brands: None. Other: Great CPU/RAM, Fast charging or long battery life, at least 12MP rear camera and sick video quality.
Having my eye on the HTC10 but I'd like to know about other phones, most interested in those that are cheaper with close specs to the necessities above.
